doc.title: Erotic Cuts, Vol. 2
doc.plot: A companion to the wildly popular Erotic Cuts, this second installment is a collection of some of the most erotic, sensual and sexually explicit material ever shot for Greenwood/Cooper Homevideo, brought to you in their original director's versions. The combination of the two makes this video, reportedly one of the most explicit in the 10% Productions stable, certainly worth it. The 58-minute production consists of a series of shorts, each increasingly more daring than the previous one. Although two of the shorts are clearly headed toward sex, each features a brand of foreplay that is both romantic and erotic in nature, and the interaction among the models on that level is a turn-on by itself. Each short also features its performers in full nudity, and the caressing and physical touching are prevalent. This video lives up to its name, and you'd have to go to another website to get more erotic than this.
